publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3632 Aileen Campbell: Crawford Primary School Supports Fairtrade Fortnightâ€”That the Parliament commends Crawford Primary School for hosting a coffee morning on Friday 6 March 2009 to raise awareness of Fairtrade Fortnight and the work undertaken by the Fairtrade Foundation and congratulates the efforts of the pupils, staff and parents in making it such a successful coffee morning and for the many tasty Fairtrade treats that were on offer.
S3M-3632 Crawford Primary School Supports Fairtrade Fortnight (lodged on 6 March 2009) Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Patricia Ferguson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3632 Crawford Primary School Supports Fairtrade Fortnight (lodged on 6 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3632 Crawford Primary School Supports Fairtrade Fortnight (lodged on 6 March 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-3632 Crawford Primary School Supports Fairtrade Fortnight (lodged on 6 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
